UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Comparing bacterial membrane interactions and antimicrobial activity of porcine lactoferricin-derived peptides.
Literature.Author: Han FF, Gao YH, Luan C, Xie YG, Liu YF, Wang YZ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli K88(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli AG1(MIC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli JM109(MIC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=256µg/ml),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=>256µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa H103(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis CMCC 50020(MIC=128µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium CMCC 50013(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis C621(MIC=128µg/ml)
